testcase.classname: Test Billing Functionality of Demo WebPage
testcase.name: User to enter billing details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page by logging in by using the johnfletcher@gmail.com and mypass1234$.passed When User loggedin navigate to Billing Page.................................passed And Now Enter respective Capgemini.........................................passed And Select the Austria and Other (Non US)...................................passed And Enter the Lower Austria name............................................passed And User Enter the flat 23,Austria,lower bridges details....................passed And Now enter the 6754321...................................................passed And Enter 987654321 in the field............................................passed And At last enter the 119086534.............................................passed And User clicks-on continue button..........................................passed And User enters to shipping step............................................passed And User Select a shipping address from your address book or enter a new address.passed And Clickon the continue button.............................................passed And Go to shipping method...................................................passed And click on the type of shipping method and tick the continue button.......passed And select the PO of payment method and press the continue button...........passed And press the confirm order button.........................................passed Then User is able to see placed order details...............................passed
